version.description1: Config version number used for auto_regen_outdated.

auto_regen_outdated.description: Should this file automatically regenerate whenever the default options are changed?

first_event_day.description1: The first day that an invasion event will happen.
first_event_day.description2: This option treats the first day in a world as day 1, unlike the vanilla F3 screen.

min_cooldown.description: The minimum number of days between events.

max_cooldown.description: The maximum number of days between events.
